Atlanta.W. W. Orr Building: The W. W. Orr Building (also known as W. W. Orr Medical Building and W. W. Orr Doctors' Building) is a landmark building at 478 Peachtree Street NE in SoNo, Atlanta. The Art Deco style building was designed by architect Francis Palmer Smith of the firm of Pringle and Smith. The building's namesake, W. W. (Wayman W.) Orr, was the president of the Atlanta Retail Merchants' Association for several years in the 1910s.
